title: React Frontend Engineer
description:
Your responsibilities

Experienced React Frontend Developer (with at least 3 years of experience in this role), with a keen eye for design and UI/UX. With experience of working in a team, preferably for large international brands. You're proactive, curious, and passionate about utilizing AI tools in your day-to-day work. Here, it's not about ticking boxes - it's about thinking outside the box

Working in a team in which you will be an important and responsible member, who will influence the final appearance of the product

Work on an innovative project for a Fortune 500 retail giant, allowing you to handle diverse data from various applications and tools

Directly impact user efficiency, providing solutions that will shape the future of retail operations

Developing new user-facing features using React

Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use

Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code

Collaborating with other team members and stakeholders

Conducting regular code reviews to ensure code quality

Share your knowledge and learn from the best - together, we rise!Our requirements

A minimum 3 years of professional experience in frontend development, with a strong focus on React.

Proven experience working in international teams, demonstrating effective communication and collaboration skills

Strong proficiency in React, JavaScript and TypeScript

Hands-on knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, API design, REST, GitHub/Git, and Docker

Familiarity with web application security best practices - we've got to keep things secure

Optional

Experience in JS testing - if you've got it, flaunt it!

Familiarity with styled-components and MS Azure services such as Web app, Storage & Azure DevOpsThis is how we organize our work
Team size
4-7
This is how we work
you focus on a single project at a timeyou can change the projectyou have influence on the technological solutions appliedyou have influence on the productyou develop the code "from scratch"you focus on product developmentagilescrumThis is how we work on a project

Clean Code

design patterns

architect / technical leader support

Continuous Deployment

Continuous Integration

DevOps

team-level deployment

documentationDevelopment opportunities we offer

industry-specific e-learning platforms

technical knowledge exchange within the companyWhat we offer

FLEXIBILITY: Enjoy the freedom of working from anywhere, and have a genuine say on our tools, tech, and solutions

STABILITY: Stable and long-term employment (employment contract, B2B)

START-UP CULTURE: Open communication, creative problem solving and a flat hierarchy

GROWTH: Skyrocket your career by exploring new territories - you can work on various projects related to Big Data and Cloud

COLLABORATION: Be part of our diverse, passionate team, where every voice matters. Work in a company full of well-coordinated people who do their work with passion and commitment

BENEFITS: Employee benefits program, certification opportunities

EQUAL OPPORTUNITY CLOUDFIDE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employeesBenefits

sharing the costs of sports activities

sharing the costs of professional training & courses

remote work opportunities

flexible working time

integration eventsRecruitment stages

CLOUDFIDE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.READY TO LAUNCH YOUR CAREER INTO THE STRATOSPHERE?

Don't just stand by, hit the "Apply" button and let's accelerate into the future together! Remember, at CLOUDFIDE there's no ceiling on what you can achieve.CLOUDFIDE SPÓŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ

At CLOUDFIDE, we do everything with data and contribute to pivotal projects for Fortune 500 companies. This is your chance to enhance your skills and leave your global footprint.

Our collaborative culture champions your professional growth. Dive into cloud data processing, gain hands-on big data experience, and leverage our team's expertise to drive your professional growth.

Here you'll have an opportunity to use advanced technologies to shape client strategies. With CLOUDFIDE, you can amplify your career alongside the industry's best.

Rozmowy kwalifikacyjneNovaris Sp. z o.o.

Firma Novaris rozpoczęła swoją działalność w 2008 roku i od tego momentu zajmuje się kreowaniem, utrzymaniem, testowaniem i adoptowaniem systemów informatycznych do potrzeb Naszych klientów.

Jednym z najważniejszych wyzwań stojących przed naszą firmą jest tworzenie nowoczesnych aplikacji przy użyciu najnowszych technologi programistycznych obecnych na rynku.

title: Frontend Developer (React)
description:
Twój zakres obowiązków

praca w projekcie z branży lotniczej, który związany jest z tworzeniem i przypisywaniem szkoleń oraz kursów członkom załogi,

tworzenie nowych i ulepszanie istniejących rozwiązań,

pisanie testów jednostkowych i integracyjnych,

opracowywanie dokumentacji technicznej,

wdrażanie nowych narzędzi i praca nad modyfikacjami aplikacji w celu jej ulepszenia,

ścisła współpraca z zespołem projektowym.Nasze wymagania

masz min. 4 lata doświadczenia na stanowisku Frontend Developer,

na co dzień pracujesz z JavaScript lub TypeScript oraz React’em,

masz doświadczenie z REST,

umiesz pisać testy jednostkowe i integracyjne,

swobodnie komunikujesz się w języku angielskim,

Mile widziane

Jesteśmy firmą technologiczną. Realizujemy projekty. Budujemy zespoły. Zapewniamy specjalistów do projektów. Za pomocą technologii wspieramy wzrost biznesowy naszych Klientów oraz tworzymy przestrzeń do ciągłego rozwoju naszego zespołu. title: Remote Frontend Developer (Vue.js)
description:

Dla Partnera z branży medycznej poszukujemy Frontend Developera (Vue.js). Specjalista dołączy do projektu, którego celem jest budowa portalu dla farmaceutów.Twój zakres obowiązków
